entry.title: List files and folders with capacity
entry.content:
How can list all files and folders with capacity

If we need know How much space do the files take up we can use this command:

For example:

du -sh *

we can see this result:

8.0K    404.html
8.0K    about
870K    assets
4.0K    atom.xml
108K    blog
5.4M    build
8.0K    favicon.ico
8.0K    index.html
512 robots.txt
512 sitemap.xml
